definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: In excess skewness the correction may be turning.
sentences.chinese: 偏斜度超过规定时，可采用车削校正。

sentences.english: Shaft drives are heavy duty to minimize deflection.
sentences.chinese: 扎实的轴心可减少偏斜。

sentences.english: Looks thesea building in the Erhai park, the angle of view Inclines, also onlycan see the Cangshan terminal.

sentences.english: Skewness is an eigenvalue of symmetric distribution of the image.
sentences.chinese: 偏斜度是一个能表征图像是否对称分布的特征量。

sentences.english: At different positions, changes in well dimension cause different deviation affects.
sentences.chinese: 在不同井径变换部位所产生的偏斜效果是不同的。

sentences.english: Knuckling at fetlocks, ataxia, tail deviation and tail may be flaccid.
sentences.chinese: 扣打距毛，运动失调，尾偏斜和尾可能松垂。

sentences.english: The bullet struck a wall and was deflected from its course.
sentences.chinese: 子弹击中了墙壁，偏斜了方向。

sentences.english: Most of its particles are deflected.
sentences.chinese: 此物质的料子大多是偏斜的。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a new algorithm of video watermarking based on skewness.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于偏斜度的视频水印新算法。
